LanguageData.PM_NaturalMeleeEffectiveness.label: natural melee weapon effectiveness
LanguageData.PM_NaturalMeleeEffectiveness.description: how effect this pawn is using 'natural' weapons like claws and fangs
LanguageData.PM_NaturalMeleeSpeed.label: natural melee weapon speed
LanguageData.PM_NaturalMeleeSpeed.description: how quick this pawn is using 'natural' weapons like claws and fangs
LanguageData.DangerousFoodSensitivity.label: dangerous food sensitivity
LanguageData.DangerousFoodSensitivity.description: How likely a pawn is to get sick from contaminated, dangerous foods.
LanguageData.RottenFoodSensitivity.label: rotten food sensitivity
LanguageData.RottenFoodSensitivity.description: How likely a pawn is to get sick from contaminated, rotten foods.
LanguageData.MutationAdaptability.label: mutation adaptability
LanguageData.MutationAdaptability.description: Multiplier on how well a pawn can adapt to mutations.
LanguageData.MutagenSensitivity.label: mutagen sensitivity
LanguageData.MutagenSensitivity.description: Multiplier on the impact of mutagenic effects on this creature.
LanguageData.PM_MutagenPainSensitivity.label: mutagen pain sensitivity
LanguageData.PM_MutagenPainSensitivity.description: how much pain a pawn receives from mutations and transformations
LanguageData.TransformationSensitivity.label: tranformation sensitivity
LanguageData.TransformationSensitivity.description: Multiplier on the impact of transformative effects on this pawn. Higher values make full transformations more likely.
LanguageData.MutationHaltChance.label: mutation halt chance
LanguageData.MutationHaltChance.description: Stat that determines how likely pawns will stop adapting to mutations.
LanguageData.MutagenSensitivity_Apparel.label: mutagen sensitivity (apparel)
LanguageData.MutagenSensitivity_Apparel.description: Multiplier on the impact of mutagenic effects on this creature.
LanguageData.MutagenSensitivity_Stuff.label: mutagen sensitivity (stuff)
LanguageData.MutagenSensitivity_Stuff.description: Multiplier on the impact of mutagenic effects on this creature.
LanguageData.MutagenSensitivity_StuffMult.label: mutagen sensitivity (stuff multiplier)
LanguageData.MutagenSensitivity_StuffMult.description: Multiplier on the impact of mutagenic effects on this creature.
LanguageData.MutaniteConcentration.label: mutanite concentration
LanguageData.MutaniteConcentration.description: The concentration of raw mutanite in this thing.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalA.label: sapience change
LanguageData.SapientAnimalA.description: Controls the degree to which a pawn resists changes in instinct.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalResistance.label: instinct resistance
LanguageData.SapientAnimalResistance.description: Controls how much control a sapient animal has before going feral.
LanguageData.SapienceRecoverFactor.label: sapience recover factor
LanguageData.SapienceRecoverFactor.description: Controls how much sapience a pawn recovers over time.
LanguageData.SapienceLimit.label: sapience limit
LanguageData.SapienceLimit.description: The maximum sapience this pawn can have.
LanguageData.PM_HasMorphStat.label: Taggable Morph
LanguageData.PM_HasMorphStat.description: The morph type that can be tagged from this animal, if any. Tagging a morph allows you to create injectors for that morph at the Injector lab, once the appropriate research has been complete. You can also scan the animal's genome for mutations at a Mutation Sequencer.
LanguageData.PM_BodySize.label: altered body size
LanguageData.PM_BodySize.description: Mutations have caused this pawn to change size.
LanguageData.PM_Lift.label: Lift
LanguageData.PM_Lift.description: How much weight mutations currently provide lift for.
